title: LORD DYING New Album 'Mysterium Tremendum' Due April; New Single
body:
LORD DYING New Album ‘Mysterium Tremendum’ Due April; New Single

Article By: Pat ‘Riot’ Whitaker, Senior Writer/Journalist ‡ Edited By: Leanne Ridgeway, Owner/Chief Editor

It has been nearly five years since we last heard from Portland’s purveyors of aggressive metallic sludge, LORD DYING. The last was by means of their 2015 outing, ‘Poisoned Altars’. (more…)

summary: You kno what, Chris Evans looks like one of those guys that will take off your makeup, wash, tone and moisturize before going to...
question: You kno what, Chris Evans looks like one of those guys that will take off your makeup, wash, tone and moisturize before going to bed if you're to drunk or tired to do it and I dare anyone to prove me wrong
answer:
I can’t prove you wrong because what you just said are straight FAX

He does look like that kind of guy. He also looks like the kind of guy that will 100% record or type down whatever you said while drunk/tired and repeat it to you in the morning.

YES! MY PUPPIES

title: Chris Evans dream
body:
So i’m attending this sort of summer/therapy camp for people with social anxiety. We’re all adults but there’s a lot of people from my past (college, high school, etc.) who are there too. Chris Evans is there. Like we all know he is THE Chris Evans but he was just hey it’s our buddy Chris to us.

We have these groups for activities and therapy sessions and it’s divvied up so that each group is a mix of issues, to try and get us to mingle.  Since we both have similar anxieties, Chris and I are in different groups. Everyone wants to be in Chris’s group though. Not because he’s famous but because he is a sweetheart and really funny.

We were on a school bus going somewhere. And we’re riding for hours and hours (and my mom was there? As like a chaperone? But MrPooslie was not??) And Chris got all anxious about being stuck on the bus and we were all pitching in to help try to calm him down. I offered him beard scratches (like a dog. No seriously, that is how I put it) and he said ok but also asked me to massage his scalp too. it was really nice, he just calmed right down and ended up sleeping with his head in my lap and my mom was PISSED because hello what would your HUSBAND say? And i was like psssh it’s fine!

Then Patton Oswalt tried to get me to join his magic the gathering group. Chris and I were both really excited about it and when I asked who the other people were, my current DnD DM was part of it but one of them is this guy Mark so I was like nope! he’s an assshoooole! Patton was like yeah but we’re in the middle of a campaign so we’re sorta stuck with him. I told him to count me in if he ever got Mark out of the group. Chris said he would skype in if he wasn’t too busy and I was like omg me and Chris are gonna be NERD BUDDIES.

Then i woke up.

blog.name: thewintermandy
blog.title: Sebastian sweetie...
blog.description:
I can't count with my fingers the fandoms I've been in. 
Sebastian Stan owns my heart.
Aspiring actress. Slytherin. Atheist. 25. Argentinian. Real Madrid until the very end.

body:
Story time

I know you hate these but ok, I need to vent out

These days have been hellish. I hate my job, I’m not a mile near of making my dreams a reality, customers are TRASH and I hope they all die a very horrible death and I’d be there to witness it, society is trashier every single day but…. Hey, I’m not the only one who feels like that, we’re all in the same boat, I think.

The only thing that has me going are fandoms right now. Sebastian Stan and his advice, Marvel that is always exciting, Chris Evans warms my heart, the Jonas Brothers are back (I want to go back to 2009 so bad… hell, I didn’t know what I had), Taylor Swift may be releasing a new single, Rami Malek won the Oscar, Olivia Colman’s acceptance speech gave me a lot of hope, even bloody Real Madrid, who are a bunch of losers, put a smile on my face.

What I want to say is that, when the people around you is shitty, fandoms may save your life and your dreams.

I don’t even care if no one reads it but… I needed to say it.

Hufflepuff, Female, INFP-T Personality, Hopeless Romantic, 20, UK, Aspiring Timelord.
Click here for everything i've ever posted, aka anything that I've made myself.
Click here for my favourite posts by others. Mostly pictures & quotes.

title: The Dorito Interview.
body:
*Chris Evans and Chris Hemsworth getting handed a bag of Doritos in an interview and beginning to eat them together*

Interviewer: "Have you ever tasted yourself?"

Evans: "I've never tasted myself before."

Hemsworth *After eating a Dorito*: "You're delicious, by the way. This is exactly what I thought you'd taste like."

*All three of them start laughing like giddy school girls*

dialogue.phrase: *Chris Evans and Chris Hemsworth getting handed a bag of Doritos in an interview and beginning to eat them together*

dialogue.name: Hemsworth *After eating a Dorito*
